## IBlit interface

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IBlit<T extends TypedArray, P> 
```

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [blit(dest, opts)](./pixel.iblit.blit.md) | Blits pixels into given <code>dest</code> pixel buffer, using provided options. If <code>dest</code> buffer is smaller than source buffer, only the top-left region will be written.<!-- -->Destination MUST be of same format as original. No conversion is performed. |
|  [blitCanvas(canvas, x, y)](./pixel.iblit.blitcanvas.md) | Converts and blits pixels into given canvas at position <code>x</code>, <code>y</code> (0,0 by default). If canvas is smaller than source buffer, only the top-left region will be written. |
